sentences.sContent: Splendid fairy-wrens are small, sexually promiscuous birds native to Australia.
sentences.sContent_eng: Splendid fairy-wrens are small, sexually promiscuous birds native to Australia.
sentences.sCn: 辉蓝细尾鹩莺是小型的，性交关系混乱的鸟儿，生长于澳大利亚。

remMethod.val: pro (向前) + miscu (混乱) + ous → 混杂的

trans.tranOther: involving a wide range of different things
